azure_openai.endpoint: <Your Azure OpenAI endpoint URL, e.g., https://your-resource.openai.azure.com>
azure_openai.deployment_name: <Name of your OpenAI model deployment, e.g., gpt-4o>
azure_openai.embeddings_deployment_name: <Name of your embeddings deployment, e.g., text-embedding-3-small>

azure_ai_search.endpoint: <Your Azure Cognitive Search endpoint URL, e.g., https://your-search-service.search.windows.net>
azure_ai_search.knowledge_source_name: <Name of your knowledge source, if used>
azure_ai_search.knowledge_agent_name: <Name of your knowledge agent, if used>
